body:
Thanks.
That is interesting it doesn't **usually*** happen when "torch.backends.cudnn.enabled = False". Another observation, when this torch.backends.cudnn.enabled is true, the memory usage increases way faster than the time this flag is false which is I guess should be the case?!.

** sometimes segmentation fault happens.
